{{Description|In the days when gods and men walked the earth together, the heavens were filled with countless songs. This melody has long since been forgotten.}}
'''Skyward Sonnet''' is [[Venti]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*{{TalentNote|particles|3|4}}
*This skill is also useful for exploration which includes: traversing very high landscapes like mountains, hills, etc. During the fixed animation where Venti is flying upward, while he cannot directly move through terrain at unclimbable angles, he moves in a large enough circle to bypass a lot of overhangs that make climbing difficult or impossible.
*On ''hold'' cast, Venti's position may changed by a forced movement effect, eg: due to creation, erasure or movement of a platform object or push/pull effect which not inflicted a flinch. However, the hit area and the position of summoned upward wind occur at Venti's cast starting position.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
*{{TalentNote|character=Venti|talent=Skyward Sonnet|ascension|1|Embrace of Winds}}
